physical_appearance: This is a long-sleeved red metallic fiber dress with Chinese buttons that run down the center of the piece.
sgcool_label_text: Mrs Sylvia Kho (nee Wong Sien Moy) was a prominent bridal designer in Singapore from the 1950s to 1990s. Beyond wedding gowns, she also designed dresses for her female relatives. This red metallic fiber dress with Chinese knot buttons was designed and made by Sylvia Kho for her seventh sister, Mrs Florence Chong (nee Wong Chit Moy).
title_text: Red Metallic Fiber Dress by Sylvia Kho nee Wong Sien Moy  Red Metallic Fiber Dress
subject_terms_2: Dresses Custom-made clothing Women's clothing Kho, Sylvia, 1917-
